subject: Self Care
title: Mindful Tech Use
description: Learn Mindful Tech Use in one minute.

hook.text: Before unlocking your phone, ask one question: what am I looking for? If you can't answer, put it down.

buildup.text: Mindful tech use means engaging with devices intentionally rather than habitually. Purpose before pixels.

discovery.text: Most phone pickups are habitual, not purposeful. Studies show 50% of screen time is unintentional browsing.

twist.text: Adding one second of intention before each phone use cuts mindless scrolling significantly. Awareness disrupts autopilot.

climax.text: Try the 'why' check: before opening any app, state your purpose out loud. 'I'm checking the weather.' Then do only that.

punchline.text: State your purpose before unlocking. Intention beats autopilot.

quiz.question: What percentage of screen time is estimated to be unintentional?
